Description: Data that is derived by measuring the average abundance of biological components from a population of cells.
No applicable or appropriate `dataSubtype` to define.
Data that is derived from an aggregation of measurements to approximate a bulk experimental proceedure from data otherwise collected with single-cell/nucleus or spatial resolution.
Data that is derived by measuring the abundance of biological components isolated from individual cells.
Data that is derived by measuring the abundance of biological components isolated from individual cell nuclei.
